paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: Mutations in the KCNH2 gene decrease the current of potassium ions per channel, thus lengthening the action potential in cardiomyocytes and neurons.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with increased risk of LQTS prolongation.
key_quotes: According to Khera et al. [47], SNV rs189014161 (3591 C > T) of the KCNH2 gene is associated with increased risk of LQTS prolongation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the KCNH2 gene was reported in the paper.
